title: The woman caring for the remains of Scotland's ancient people
description: Dr Jess Thompson is Scotland’s first curator of osteoarchaeology .

title: Results of review into Year 12 ancient history exam gaffes at nine Queensland schools revealed
description: The government hopes to ensure ‘history never repeats itself’.

title: Excavations at Taxila’s Bhir Mound reveal traces of ancient city before 6th century BC
description: Traces found of narrow streets, residential structures, water wells, areas for storing grain, daily use artefacts

title: Ancient lake from ice age comes back to life in Death Valley after record rainfall
description: Between 128,000 and 186,000 years ago, when ice covered the Sierra Nevada, a lake 100 miles long and 600 feet deep sat in eastern California in what is now the Mojave Desert.
